1.1.name: wordpress/page-expiration-robot
1.1.description:
Double (even TRIPLE!) your conversions by setting up timed-offers, one time offers and schedule pages and posts to expire (on visitor-by-visitor basis) and redirect expired visitors to a different offer or URL. Optionally, you can add an attention-grabbing countdown timer that will show visitors every second they’re losing by not taking action immediately!

Here are just few of the amazing features:

  1. Turn WP pages (or posts) into one-time offers
  2. Schedule expiration on specific date, time or period
  3. Redirect expired visitors to a different URL/offer
  4. Add LIVE attention-grabbing countdown timer (optional)
  5. Create perpetual expirations for automation
  6. Set visitors to expire either by IP or Cookie
  7. Set fixed-time expiration for all visitors
  8. Plugin works with both WP Pages and Blog Posts.
